attributes.review: I downloaded this app so i can support and learn about our best president but as soon and i opened it the app crashed and trump was stuck on my phone!!! later the police came and yelled trump 2020 at me and started to do a choreographed dance in front of my house. I am truly traumatized. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: this app crashed my phone!!!

attributes.review: This app is probably the worst app on the apple app store and should be removed! Let’s start out with the development, it’s hard to navigate through and there were MANY errors and it made my phone crash a few times! It is also an app made for an orange!! >:((🍊👄🍊
attributes.title: 🌸💞❤️🍄🌸✨🌸DO NOT GET🍄✨❤️🌸✨

attributes.review: Once I got on the app a weird sound started playing and made my dog start to doing weird things!!! He started defecating everywhere! After that I started urinating myself non stop. And started feeling bugs crawling in my skin, 0/0 wont download again
attributes.title: Disgusting and disappointing

attributes.review: It always lags and I can NEVER get on for more than two minutes without it crashing!! It’s filled with adds and it makes you accidentally tap on them only to take you to a website that’s filled with spams and viruses!!! Delete this from the App Store IMMEDIATELY!!!!😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: I don’t even know what to say . But all I know is that this app drained my phone completely and gave my phone a bunch of viruses. I have to take my phone to the store to get it fixed because my other apps won’t work .
attributes.title: I wish I could give 0 stars .

attributes.review: I opened the app and then i saw this old dude he sort of looked like the Cheetos tiger but i don’t remember the Cheetos tiger letting himself go this far, sad. I really had high expectations but instead i got high disappointment i hope you get this glitched fixed maybe get someone else to represent. 😔
attributes.title: Disappointment

attributes.review: First off, when I opened this app an image of a self absorbed cheeto instead of the president. Really disappointed tbh. Also not to mention this app SMELLS SO BAD LIKE HUN SPRAY SOME AIR FRESHENER MY GAWD.  It was very glitchy, smelly, ugly, and there was hair all over the app. I would give it a zero if I could. Take down the app, and don’t forget #savebarronmelania2020         👁👄👁✌️
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app was full of bugs and too top it off a scary Cheeto man popped on my screen. I was scared for my friends and family I can’t believe that apple allowed such scary and unholy images on a platform that have kids on it. And it’s teaching the young that having a horrible spray tan is okay. I WILL NOT STAND FOR THIS INJUSTICE THIS APP NEEDS TO LEAVE FOR THE SAKE OF ALL THE INNOCENT CHILDREN WHO MIGHT COME UPON THIS APP

i didn’t expect much when i downloaded this app but once i logged in it was just too much false information. yet i had hopes for it and now i have 4 seats reserved for his next rally...to bad i have to take my fish for a walk that day.
attributes.title: False information❤️

attributes.review: This app is awful. It’s ran by an orange child rapist. It disgusts me that anyone would vote for him. This app should be taken down because it’s vile. Who would let a child rapist, predator, incestuous pervert be president? And while they’re at it make an app? Awful. I would give it a 0 star review if it were possible.
attributes.title: Awful
